1: מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> הֶאֱמִ֖ין <sup>539 </sup> <n>Who hath believed</n> לִשְׁמֻעָתֵ֑נוּ <sup>8052 </sup> <n>bruit</n> וּזְר֥וֹעַ <sup>2220 </sup> <n>has the arm</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> נִגְלָֽתָה׃ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>revealed</n>
2: וַיַּ֨עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>For he shall grow up</n> כַּיּוֹנֵ֜ק <sup>3126 </sup> <n>him as a tender plant</n> לְפָנָ֗יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וְכַשֹּׁ֙רֶשׁ֙ <sup>8328 </sup> <n>and as a root</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>ground</n> צִיָּ֔ה <sup>6723 </sup> <n>out of a dry</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has no</n> תֹ֥אַר <sup>8389 </sup> <n>he hath no form</n> ל֖וֹ וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> הָדָ֑ר <sup>1926 </sup> <n>nor comeliness</n> וְנִרְאֵ֥הוּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and when we shall see</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> מַרְאֶ֖ה <sup>4758 </sup> <n>him [there is] no beauty</n> וְנֶחְמְדֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>2530 </sup> <n>that we should desire</n>
3: נִבְזֶה֙ <sup>959 </sup> <n>He is despised</n> וַחֲדַ֣ל <sup>2310 </sup> <n>and rejected</n> אִישִׁ֔ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>of men</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> מַכְאֹב֖וֹת <sup>4341 </sup> <n>of sorrows</n> וִיד֣וּעַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and acquainted</n> חֹ֑לִי <sup>2483 </sup> <n>with grief</n> וּכְמַסְתֵּ֤ר <sup>4564 </sup> <n>and we hid as it were</n> פָּנִים֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[our] faces</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> נִבְזֶ֖ה <sup>959 </sup> <n>from him he was despised</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> חֲשַׁבְנֻֽהוּ׃ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>and we esteemed</n>
4: אָכֵ֤ן <sup>403 </sup> <n>Surely</n> חֳלָיֵ֙נוּ֙ <sup>2483 </sup> <n>our griefs</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>Himself</n> נָשָׂ֔א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>he hath borne</n> וּמַכְאֹבֵ֖ינוּ <sup>4341 </sup> <n>our sorrows</n> סְבָלָ֑ם <sup>5445 </sup> <n>and carried</n> וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>ourselves</n> חֲשַׁבְנֻ֔הוּ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>yet we did esteem</n> נָג֛וּעַ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>him stricken</n> מֻכֵּ֥ה <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smitten</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> וּמְעֻנֶּֽה׃ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>and afflicted</n>
5: וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> מְחֹלָ֣ל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>But he [was] wounded</n> מִפְּשָׁעֵ֔נוּ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>for our transgressions</n> מְדֻכָּ֖א <sup>1792 </sup> <n>[he was] bruised</n> מֵעֲוֹנֹתֵ֑ינוּ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>for our iniquities</n> מוּסַ֤ר <sup>4148 </sup> <n>the chastisement</n> שְׁלוֹמֵ֙נוּ֙ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>of our peace</n> עָלָ֔יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and by</n> וּבַחֲבֻרָת֖וֹ <sup>2250 </sup> <n>[was] upon him and with his stripes</n> נִרְפָּא־ <sup>7495 </sup> <n>we are healed</n> לָֽנוּ׃
6: כֻּלָּ֙נוּ֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> כַּצֹּ֣אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>All we like sheep</n> תָּעִ֔ינוּ <sup>8582 </sup> <n>have gone astray</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>to his own way</n> פָּנִ֑ינוּ <sup>6437 </sup> <n>we have turned</n> וַֽיהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> הִפְגִּ֣יעַ <sup>6293 </sup> <n>hath laid</n> בּ֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> עֲוֹ֥ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>on him the iniquity</n> כֻּלָּֽנוּ׃ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n>
7: נִגַּ֨שׂ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>He was oppressed</n> וְה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and He</n> נַעֲנֶה֮ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>and he was afflicted</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יִפְתַּח־ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>yet he opened</n> פִּיו֒ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>not his mouth</n> כַּשֶּׂה֙ <sup>7716 </sup> <n>as a lamb</n> לַטֶּ֣בַח <sup>2874 </sup> <n>to the slaughter</n> יוּבָ֔ל <sup>2986 </sup> <n>he is brought</n> וּכְרָחֵ֕ל <sup>7353 </sup> <n>and as a sheep</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> גֹזְזֶ֖יהָ <sup>1494 </sup> <n>her shearers</n> נֶאֱלָ֑מָה <sup>481 </sup> <n>is dumb</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יִפְתַּ֖ח <sup>6605 </sup> <n>so he openeth</n> פִּֽיו׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>not his mouth</n>
8: מֵעֹ֤צֶר <sup>6115 </sup> <n>from prison</n> וּמִמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and from judgment</n> לֻקָּ֔ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>He was taken</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דּוֹר֖וֹ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>his generation</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> יְשׂוֹחֵ֑חַ <sup>7878 </sup> <n>and who shall declare</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִגְזַר֙ <sup>1504 </sup> <n>was cut</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> חַיִּ֔ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n> מִפֶּ֥שַׁע <sup>6588 </sup> <n>for the transgression</n> עַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> נֶ֥גַע <sup>5061 </sup> <n>was he stricken</n> לָֽמוֹ׃
9: וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And he made</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> רְשָׁעִים֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>with the wicked</n> קִבְר֔וֹ <sup>6913 </sup> <n>his grave</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>was with</n> עָשִׁ֖יר <sup>6223 </sup> <n>and with the rich</n> בְּמֹתָ֑יו <sup>4194 </sup> <n>in his death</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> חָמָ֣ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>no violence</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>because he had done</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> מִרְמָ֖ה <sup>4820 </sup> <n>neither [was any] deceit</n> בְּפִֽיו׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>in his mouth</n>
10: וַיהוָ֞ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> חָפֵ֤ץ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>Yet it pleased</n> דַּכְּאוֹ֙ <sup>1792 </sup> <n>to bruise</n> הֶֽחֱלִ֔י <sup>2470 </sup> <n>him he hath put [him] to grief</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> תָּשִׂ֤ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>when thou shalt make</n> אָשָׁם֙ <sup>817 </sup> <n>an offering for sin</n> נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his soul</n> יִרְאֶ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>he shall see</n> זֶ֖רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>[his] seed</n> יַאֲרִ֣יךְ <sup>748 </sup> <n>he shall prolong</n> יָמִ֑ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>[his] days</n> וְחֵ֥פֶץ <sup>2656 </sup> <n>and the pleasure</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> בְּיָד֥וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n> יִצְלָֽח׃ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>shall prosper</n>
11: מֵעֲמַ֤ל <sup>5999 </sup> <n>of the travail</n> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of his soul</n> יִרְאֶ֣ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>He shall see</n> יִשְׂבָּ֔ע <sup>7646 </sup> <n>[and] shall be satisfied</n> בְּדַעְתּ֗וֹ <sup>1847 </sup> <n>by his knowledge</n> יַצְדִּ֥יק <sup>6663 </sup> <n>justify</n> צַדִּ֛יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>shall my righteous</n> עַבְדִּ֖י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>servant</n> לָֽרַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> וַעֲוֹנֹתָ֖ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>their iniquities</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> יִסְבֹּֽל׃ <sup>5445 </sup> <n>for he shall bear</n>
12: לָכֵ֞ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> אֲחַלֶּק־ <sup>2505 </sup> <n>Therefore will I divide</n> ל֣וֹ בָרַבִּ֗ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>him [a portion] with the great</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> עֲצוּמִים֮ <sup>6099 </sup> <n>with the strong</n> יְחַלֵּ֣ק <sup>2505 </sup> <n>and he shall divide</n> שָׁלָל֒ <sup>7998 </sup> <n>the spoil</n> תַּ֗חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> הֶעֱרָ֤ה <sup>6168 </sup> <n>because he hath poured out</n> לַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>unto death</n> נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his soul</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> פֹּשְׁעִ֖ים <sup>6586 </sup> <n>with the transgressors</n> נִמְנָ֑ה <sup>4487 </sup> <n>and he was numbered</n> וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>Himself</n> חֵטְא־ <sup>2399 </sup> <n>the sin</n> רַבִּ֣ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>of many</n> נָשָׂ֔א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and he bare</n> וְלַפֹּשְׁעִ֖ים <sup>6586 </sup> <n>for the transgressors</n> יַפְגִּֽיעַ׃ <sup>6293 </sup> <n>and made intercession</n> ס
